title: Homeopathy
sitename: Farmacia Berdaguer, tu farmacia online en Marbella
cleaned_text: and acts against dizziness caused by the means of locomotion. It is indicated in the prevention and treatment of dizziness and inflammations of the conjunctiva (conjunctivitis) excessive exertion or allergic reactions; dry eyes. Founded in 1956 in the center of Marbella, since then the Berdaguer Pharmacy has become a reference for the city. Always innovating and anticipating the changes of the 21st century, we were the first 24-hour pharmacy in the city. We also became the first pharmacy to automatically manage our products through robotics equipment. Your online pharmacy in Marbella is already a leader in the pharmaceutical sector on the Costa del Sol.
